title: Saeima elections in Rīga will have 158 polling stations, including zoo
summary_full: On Wednesday, the Rīga City Council approved the list of polling stations for the 15th Saeima elections scheduled for October 3 this year – voters in the capital will be able to cast their ballots at 158 polling stations.
summary_public: On Wednesday, the Rīga City Council approved the list of polling stations for the 15th Saeima elections scheduled for October 3 this year – voters in the capital will be able to cast their ballots at 158 polling stations…
